name: Allinadigitalbot
0:
”Alexa launch my allina digital bot”
”Alexa open my allina digital bot”
”Alexa load my allina digital bot”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my allina digital bot
des:
Allina bot skill is connect the customer with a chatbot. The chatbot is an enterprise public application that has been hosted in azure. The users can ask enterprise related queries to the chatbot and the chatbot responses through alexa. 

Users can ask FAQ related questions to the chatbot.

Sample Utterances:

HR Policies.
